summary: Are you looking for some cute and quality merch?
body:
Are you looking for some cute and quality merch?

Well, while I’m not really in the 1D fandom @thatdimpledharry is making really cool bookmarks and pillows that are definitely work checking out . Some of these bookmarks are the 1D symbol, Harry Styles ‘Treat People with Kindness’ slogan , or Louis Tomlinson’s ‘Miss you’, (and more!)

Not a fan of 1D? That’s okay!

There’s also a lot of the cute Harry Potter bookmarks and merchandise to check out, so if you’re looking for a gift for yourself or a friend that loves either or both of these things you should def check out @thatdimpledharry’s blog.

summary: Do you think Harry is dating Kiko Mizuhara or Kaia Gerber or something? Please answer this,love you 💕💕
question: Do you think Harry is dating Kiko Mizuhara or Kaia Gerber or something? Please answer this,love you 💕💕
answer:
Okay I definitely don’t think he’s dating Kaia Gerber because she’s still a child (model or not) and he probably sees her like a sister than anything else.

Kiko… I have no idea 🤷🏼‍♀️ I don’t know anything about her, I only learned something about her like 3 weeks ago when all that stuff about her came out. If they are that’s cool, I’m not one to have a personal opinion on the girls he dates tbh 😊

Kate x

summary: things i am sure harry styles does as your best friend.
title: things i am sure harry styles does as your best friend.
body:
1. hang out at your place even when you’re not there. 

2. share comic books with you. 

3. have friday film days with you watching rom-coms. 

4. make fun of every guy you go out on a date with. 

5. know that secretly you two are endgame. 

6. bake cookies with your little sister. 

7. let you borrow his t-shirts. 

8. bring in his girlfriends for interviews so you can approve of them. 

9. have inside jokes with you so no one can intrude on your conversations. 

10. save your number as fart monster on his phone. 

11. hug you when you’re crying. 

12. secretly threaten every guy you go out with. 

13. leave notes in your first edition books. 

14. call you a nerd but secretly be proud of it. 

15. never let you do stupid things…alone.

summary: playlist:  its 1am, its raining and you’re on your way home from a party where you drank way too much. your boyfriend and you...
question: playlist:  its 1am, its raining and you’re on your way home from a party where you drank way too much. your boyfriend and you split up that night too, you cry the whole way home. your clothes are soaking wet and your freezing. you can barely walk, maybe because of the cold, or maybe because of your aching heart
answer:
raining heartbreak

blog.name: stylishxrry
blog.title: Hello
blog.description: "Instabook, Facetagram." - Liam Payne OTRA, Brisbane Show, 11th Feb, 2015.

title: WHO IS THE BETTER STYLES?
body:
A/N: I just want to apologise about how short and crappy this is. During the writing process my mum rang and told me that my dog has passed away this afternoon. Please bare with me, I promise my writing will get better. Please send in your requests here. I hope you’ve had a better day than what I have. 

Warnings: none

Word Count: 672

Anon: can you write an imagine about how’s harry’s girl is a youtuber and gemma is also her best friend so play a game called ‘who’s the better styles’ and harry gets all pouty cuz he lost and just a lot of fluff?:)

Right on time, there was a knock on your apartment door. As planned less than twenty four hours ago, your boyfriend and your best friend (who also happened to be his sister) turned up to help you film your new video for your YouTube Channel.

“Y/N!” Gemma said as she pulled you into a tight hug before Harry could even say hello to you. You and Gemma have known each other for six years now after meeting at a convention for a campaign that you were both very passionate about and have clicked ever since. You met her brother, your now boyfriend, Harry when your flight was delayed to go back home to visit your family due to bad weather conditions. And the rest is history.

The video was a ‘Who is the better Styles’!’ and it was one of your most requested videos. You asked Gemma and Harry a series of questions to see who knew you better. The final score was 6-4 to Gemma.

“I feel so embarrassed to lose a game about how well I know my girlfriend” Harry joked during the video, wrapping you in his arms as you finished up your video. “If you would like to see Harry in more videos where I promise he’ll win and we’ll inflate his ego, please like and subscribe and I’ll see you all in the next time!” You say and shut the camera off.

Once you had filmed the video and Harry stayed with you at your apartment to spend the night. Gemma had gone home. You had ordered a pizza to be delivered and you were flicking through the TV channels to find something to watch while you wait.

“Hey Y/N?” Harry said, shifting his entire body so he could look at you. He had pulled the sleeves of his jumper over his hands, which was something he only did when he was feeling down. Losing in the video you had filmed earlier was getting to him and he was really anxious about what he would think.

“H, are you okay?” You ask, grabbing onto one of his covered hands. “I just, I feel so stupid for not being the one to win that competition. I know it was just a game for your Channel, but I feel like shit. I feel like I should know you better than that. Those questions I got wrong were questions I should have known the answer to. And I get it if you’re upset with me, or are annoyed that I didn’t know them” He said, trying to avoid your eye contact.

“Harry Styles. Don’t be ridiculous.” You start, making him look at you. “You are more than perfect. To be fair, the questions that you got wrong were questions that Gemma would have known because they happened before I met you. I love you incredibly, and the fact that you got two questions wrong doesn’t bother me at all. I know that you know me well and that you love me more than anything. Don’t let this get to you, please.” You say, embracing him in a tight hug. Harry began rubbing circles into the small of your back, holding you close against his chest.

“I love you so much” He whispered, barely being able to hear him. You pulled away to look at him, and he smashed his lips against yours into a loving kiss. The kiss was interrupted by the doorbell. “Pizza’s here. Somebody should probably get that” You whispered, pecking his lips once more before answering the door.

blog.name: hes-writer
blog.title: only angel
blog.description:
E, 18 | I write about H 💫| angst writer |

https://hes-writer.tumblr.com/post/182379780183/masterlist

title: Evie’s Onesie
body:
Summary: Harry notices Evie’s new clothing

Warnings: fluff!

Word Count: 781 words 

Small paw-steps padded against the hardwood flooring, the nails scratching the floor but the fur covered paws provide insulation. The cat moved its body from the hallway of the kitchen and to–presumably–the living room as it took a route passing by the main entryway where Harry stood with his feet temporarily planted on the ground. His shoes were matted on the ‘welcome’ rug right in front of the door while his keys clattered on the bowl situated on the side table by the closet.

He turns around from hanging his coat on the rack when the minute movements made his ears quirk and he had planned to greet the little kitty but he was distracted by what it was wearing. He slipped on white slippers on his feet before he carried himself to where the cat went. He could hear her before he saw Y/N; sitting on the couch with little Evie purring in her arms, eyes closed while the vibrations indicated that it was relaxed.

“Is the cat in a onesie?” He questioned, leaning his weight on one knee as he knelt down the ground beside his loves.

“Uh, obviously not,” Y/N quipped back, stroking the fabric encasing Evie’s black fur.

Harry rolls his eyes at her answer and he mentally facepalms himself from asking such a rhetorical question. “What I meant was where did you get it from?”

His hands join Y/N in petting the cat, Evie’s eyes jolts open and she fights to wriggle her body against Y/N’s arms to escape the extra weight stroking her fur.

“Hey, hey don’t be so heavy with your hand,” Y/N says, scolding Harry. “You know that scares her,”

Harry pouts, planting his bum on his heels and he backs his upper body away from Y/N in mock offense.

“‘M sorry, Evie”

The cat meows quietly towards Harry. Her paws pry against Y/N’s forearms and she trips a bit from the crevices of the couch on her way to Harry’s right arm which was perched on the armchair. Evie kitten licks his wrist to grab his attention even though his green eyes were already watching the pets’ every move. When Harry fails to react on time, Evie uses her claws to lightly scratch the surface of his skin.

“Oww, Evie don’t do that!” Harry retorts, finger pointing at the cat’s direction to reprimand her.

Evie stares at him in silence, tongue poking out to lick its nose while Harry stared back; determined to not let the animal win the stare-off. Y/N scratches her hair, watching the scene in front of her.

“Meow”

“That’s right, you better say sorry,” Harry says, folding his arms across his chest in an effort to make himself look tougher. “I feed you, I give you a home to live in,”

Y/N watches in amusement as her boyfriend continues on with his rant.

“I buy your toy mice, I even pay god knows how much for your kitty daycare and your spa days!”

Evie gawks at him, meowing every now and then as if she was acknowledging Harry’s complaints.

“Harry, I think she gets it,” Y/N’s gentle voice speaks out, her hand patting Evie’s head softly.

“And that onesie, you’ll be cold without it,” He shakes his head while tilting his chin up. ‘It’s a good thing me and your mum, Y/N, love you so much,”

Evie lets out a series of meows before jumping on the armrest, sitting on his forearm and curls herself up on his body. Y/N could see Harry’s eyes soften at the sight, and even more when the cat lays its head and starts rubbing his skin. The purrs she lets out makes Harry coo at the adorable pet his mum had given him.

“Awww, you always know how to make me feel bad, don’t ya Evie?” His large hand raises to pet her, but Y/N’s warning glance reminds him to be a little soft on his touch.

“Who’s a good little kitty?” Harry says, using baby talk that makes Y/N so endeared with the boy in front of her. “You are. Evie’s a good kitty,”

He lifts the cats’ body up to cradle between his arms while he wiggles his brows to Y/N to direct her to scooch down a bit so he had space on the couch.

“Isn’t she a good kitty, Y/N?” He raises Evie up to Y/N’s line of sight. All she could see was the felines’ large eyes staring right back at her. What’s more is that the onesies’ hoodie was draped over her head, hiding Evie’s ears away from view.

“Yes, Harry. She is,”

—-

permanent taglist; @ynm1505 @kissme-hs @agoddamnmango @kettxo queued post since I figured one of my own wrecked the hecc out of you
body_abstract:
Summary: Harry notices Evie’s new clothing

Warnings: fluff!

Word Count: 781 words 

Small paw-steps padded against the hardwood flooring, the nails scratching the floor but the fur covered paws provide insulation. The cat moved its body from the hallway of the kitchen and to–presumably–the living room as it took a route passing by the main entryway where Harry stood with his feet temporarily planted on the ground. His shoes were matted on the ‘welcome’ rug right in front of the door while his keys clattered on the bowl situated on the side table by the closet.

He turns around from hanging his coat on the rack when the minute movements made his ears quirk and he had planned to greet the little kitty but he was distracted by what it was wearing. He slipped on white slippers on his feet before he carried himself to where the cat went. He could hear her before he saw Y/N; sitting on the couch with little Evie purring in her arms, eyes closed while the vibrations indicated that it was relaxed.

“Is the cat in a onesie?” He questioned, leaning his weight on one knee as he knelt down the ground beside his loves.

Warnings: fluff!

Word Count: 781 words 

Small paw-steps padded against the hardwood flooring, the nails scratching the floor but the fur covered paws provide insulation. His shoes were matted on the ‘welcome’ rug right in front of the door while his keys clattered on the bowl situated on the side table by the closet.

He turns around from hanging his coat on the rack when the minute movements made his ears quirk and he had planned to greet the little kitty but he was distracted by what it was wearing. He slipped on white slippers on his feet before he carried himself to where the cat went. He could hear her before he saw Y/N; sitting on the couch with little Evie purring in her arms, eyes closed while the vibrations indicated that it was relaxed.

“Is the cat in a onesie?” He questioned, leaning his weight on one knee as he knelt down the ground beside his loves.

[[MORE]]

“Uh, obviously not,” Y/N quipped back, stroking the fabric encasing Evie’s black fur.

Harry rolls his eyes at her answer and he mentally facepalms himself from asking such a rhetorical question. “What I meant was where did you get it from?”

His hands join Y/N in petting the cat, Evie’s eyes jolts open and she fights to wriggle her body against Y/N’s arms to escape the extra weight stroking her fur.

“Hey, hey don’t be so heavy with your hand,” Y/N says, scolding Harry. “You know that scares her,”

Harry pouts, planting his bum on his heels and he backs his upper body away from Y/N in mock offense.

“‘M sorry, Evie”

When Harry fails to react on time, Evie uses her claws to lightly scratch the surface of his skin.

“Oww, Evie don’t do that!” Harry retorts, finger pointing at the cat’s direction to reprimand her.

Evie stares at him in silence, tongue poking out to lick its nose while Harry stared back; determined to not let the animal win the stare-off. Y/N scratches her hair, watching the scene in front of her.

“Meow”

“That’s right, you better say sorry,” Harry says, folding his arms across his chest in an effort to make himself look tougher. “I feed you, I give you a home to live in,”

Y/N watches in amusement as her boyfriend continues on with his rant.

“I buy your toy mice, I even pay god knows how much for your kitty daycare and your spa days!”

Evie gawks at him, meowing every now and then as if she was acknowledging Harry’s complaints.

“Harry, I think she gets it,” Y/N’s gentle voice speaks out, her hand patting Evie’s head softly.

“And that onesie, you’ll be cold without it,” He shakes his head while tilting his chin up. ‘It’s a good thing me and your mum, Y/N, love you so much,”

Evie lets out a series of meows before jumping on the armrest, sitting on his forearm and curls herself up on his body. Y/N could see Harry’s eyes soften at the sight, and even more when the cat lays its head and starts rubbing his skin. The purrs she lets out makes Harry coo at the adorable pet his mum had given him.

“Awww, you always know how to make me feel bad, don’t ya Evie?” His large hand raises to pet her, but Y/N’s warning glance reminds him to be a little soft on his touch.

“Who’s a good little kitty?” Harry says, using baby talk that makes Y/N so endeared with the boy in front of her. “You are. Evie’s a good kitty,”

He lifts the cats’ body up to cradle between his arms while he wiggles his brows to Y/N to direct her to scooch down a bit so he had space on the couch.

“Isn’t she a good kitty, Y/N?” He raises Evie up to Y/N’s line of sight. All she could see was the felines’ large eyes staring right back at her. What’s more is that the onesies’ hoodie was draped over her head, hiding Evie’s ears away from view.

“Yes, Harry. She is,”

—-

title: Beautiful Thing
body:
Without you here I am boring. Something inside you is triggering, it makes me myself, makes me funny. You’re a beautiful thing.

11

Never would I had thought that I would wake up next to Harry Styles in the morning. It was always a fantasy of mine I had when I went through my… I guess you can call it, “Missing Harry” phase; but…

Read more…

blog.description: 23 but often grumbles like a 90 year old // oh so very English // I write about Harry, feedback is always appreciated, but be NICE or don’t bother // Requests are currently CLOSED // Masterlist Kiddies!

summary: Maybe don't do smut if you don't like that but maybe you could do the first date, the first encounter, the first time she hears...
question: Maybe don't do smut if you don't like that but maybe you could do the first date, the first encounter, the first time she hears that he "might be gay." (Maybe she could mention it or something and he brushes it off but she finds him by a lake or something skipping rocks and crying.)
answer:
Okay maybe I was mean because I actually really love the idea to actually properly write the time they first met…

BUT I ALSO LOVE THIS

This is what I wanted!!! Send me more ideas so I can milk it for what it’s worth!!

Maybe I’ll call it A Series of Parental Events…

I’m not funny I know 😩

summary: Can't you just imagine sitting watching an old film with Harry and seeing him get simultaneously excited and annoyed when...
question: Can't you just imagine sitting watching an old film with Harry and seeing him get simultaneously excited and annoyed when someone makes a joke "he thought yp" or is wearing "his hat"?
answer:
How about a list of things he would say tho???

  • Scoffs loudly. “That joke was rubbish, he thinks he’s soooo funny.”
  • “Is he an idiot?!”
  • “Don’t you think the way people kiss in old movies is really weird?”
  • “Like why has he basically got his entire mouth around hers?”
  • “Maybe we should try it.” And then he winks at you and you’re just thinking what the fuck I love him?
  • “I’ve been there!”
  • “And there!”
  • “I saw a really fucking huge dog there once, best day of my life.” You’re married…
  • “Hey, he’s got a hat like mine!”


And all the while you’re throwing baffled and wide eyed glances as his arm rests lazily across your shoulder, the other constantly fiddling with the bottom of your t-shirt, his fingers lightly grazing against the skin of your stomach every now and then.

Hxjjdbejdksnsjfje ellie If this is you I stg 😩

blog.name: amsterdamwithoutlarry

blog.description:

summary: Hey guys. I’m currently working on some of the requests I got yesterday afternoon! If there is anything else you’d like to see...
body: Hey guys. I’m currently working on some of the requests I got yesterday afternoon! If there is anything else you’d like to see while I’m in this writing mood, please send me a message and I’ll start getting these out ASAP! :) I am planning a big night of watching Netflix and writing so please keep me busy!
